ygData.subject: Re: Make poison
ygData.msgSnippet: I m definetely interested as well... Osooroshii Master Brewer/Potter Great Fletcher Erollisi Marr
ygData.messageBody:
I'm definetely interested as well...

Osooroshii
Master Brewer/Potter
Great Fletcher
Erollisi Marr

"Z.M. Kulik" wrote:

> From: "Z.M. Kulik" <direhawk@...>
>
> BTW..did you know that you dont have to be a rogue to make poison..??
> I dont want to spoile that to you..if you want to know how, just post a message
> here.
> (btw. you dont even need vials, and pelts)
>
> Bill Fryman wrote:
>
> > From: Bill Fryman <wef1501@...>
> >
> > I was informed by a rogue who was taking up pottery(only found one
> > who would buy vials, the rest decided they would learn to make their
> > own<grumble>) that their aren't any poison recipes using the sealed vial
> > yet, so that I shouldn't bother trying to make one. Could anyone confirm this?
> >
